alert.note: Alert for Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 4:12PM EDT until April 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Turner County in south central Georgia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 412 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles west of Ashburn, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Ashburn around 425 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Worth, Coverdale, Sycamore, Amboy, Rebecca, Hobby, Turner Co Airport, Dakota and Inaha. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
